pages.text:
KNOW YOUR ENEMY 
 Rats are highly intelligent creatures. They can and will crawl through waste pipes, infesting any area where they can find food in copious amounts. For that, mere human waste will suffice. 
 
 INSTRUCTIONS 
 This bait simulates a tasty treat, virtually irresistible to the rodent mind. Place it in your home and the unsuspecting pest will seek it out and die of acute bromide poisoning. 
 
 USE RESTRICTIONS 
 Do NOT use this product in sewers or in any place where water sources might be contaminated.
